name: Notify
description: The Notify module provides a unified interface for sending notifications across different notification systems. It automatically detects and uses the configured notification system.

clientFunctions.name: SendNotify
clientFunctions.description: Sends a notification message to the client with specified type and duration.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of notification (success, error, info, warning)

clientFunctions.example:
local Bridge = exports['community_bridge']:Bridge()

-- Send a success notification
Bridge.Notify.SendNotify("Action completed successfully!", "success", 5000)

-- Send an error notification with default duration
Bridge.Notify.SendNotify("Something went wrong!", "error")

clientFunctions.name: GetResourceName
clientFunctions.description: Gets the name of the currently active notification system.

returns.description: Name of the notification resource being used

clientFunctions.example:
local Bridge = exports['community_bridge']:Bridge()

local notifySystem = Bridge.Notify.GetResourceName()
print("Using notification system: " .. notifySystem)

serverFunctions.name: SendNotify
serverFunctions.description: Sends a notification message to a specific player.

parameters.name: src
parameters.description: Player server ID to send notification to

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of notification (success, error, info, warning)

serverFunctions.example:
local Bridge = exports['community_bridge']:Bridge()

-- Send notification to specific player
Bridge.Notify.SendNotify(source, "Welcome to the server!", "info", 8000)

-- Send error notification
Bridge.Notify.SendNotify(source, "You don't have permission!", "error")
